name: Sinusoidal Earrings - Natural or Black leather
description:
Sinusoidal Earrings from the Periodical collection.

Simple and versatile, made by weaving the leather up and down into the brass shape. The leather become dashes that match naturally with the brass dots.

2.5” (6.4 cm) long.
Choose between Gold-filled and Brass earwires.
Choose Black or Natural leather.

The metal pieces and wire are made in the US.
Leather is made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: Periodical - Adjustable Rings
description:
Brass adjustable brass beaded ring with a touch of leather from my Periodical collection.

Good for ring sizes 5 and up.
Choose your color! Black or Natural.

The brass shapes are made in the US.
Leather is made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: Periodical Bracelet - Black or Natural leather
description:
Available in 6.5" (16.5 cm) and 7.5" (19 cm) long. 

If you want a different length, choose "Other Inches" and let me know the length in the Message to Seller during checkout.

The brass shapes are made in the US.
Leather is made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

Choose your color and length below.

name: Sinusoidal Necklace
description:
Simple and versatile, necklace made by weaving the leather up and down into the brass shape. The leather become dashes that match naturally with the brass dots.

The pendant is 2" (5 cm) long.
The brass chain is 24” (60 cm) max length. Adjustable to 22" and 20". 
If you want a different length, please let me know in the Note to Seller during checkout.

The brass shapes are made in the US.
Leather is made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

Choose between Black and Natural leather.

name: Scattered Earrings - Black or Natural leather
description:
These are like the Sinusoidal earrings but with a dangling fringe chain for a more sophisticated and ready for a Friday night look. I called this design Scattered (nothing personal here!).

Simple and versatile, made by weaving the leather up and down into the brass shape. The leather become dashes that match naturally with the brass dots.

5.5”-6" (14-15 cm) long.
The chain and the base shape are brass.
Choose between Gold-filled and Brass earwires.
Choose between Black and Natural leather.

The metal pieces and wire are made in the US.
Leather is made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: Loop Earrings - Black or Natural
description:
These hoops are fun and interesting, with a wavy look in all directions. Lines and dots talking to each other.

I shape the brass piece into a circle and then weave the leather up and down, up and down, just following the rhythm. Then, I make the earwire by hand to complement the shape. 

They measure less than 1” (2.5 cm) wide and 1.5” (3.9 cm) long.
Choose between Gold-filled and Brass earwires.

The metal pieces and wire are made in the US.
Leather is made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

Available in Black and Natural.

name: Nudo Circled bracelet
description:
Bracelet hand fabricated from brass and blue knotted leather.

MADE TO ORDER. Please allow up to 7 business days for the making of this one. If you're in a hurry let me know and I'll see what I can do.

Brass sheets are cut, drilled, cleaned and formed. The leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. It also goes through small brass beads that gives it all the character and charm.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original and was made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. It is hand-dyed by me in a yummy raspberry color to make it look like a tie-dye.

It measures 3/8" wide (1 cm) and 5.5" (14 cm) long, adjustable. If you need a special length, please contact me.

name: Tiny teardrop Nudo Earrings
description:
These simple brass teardrop shaped earrings feature my signature leather "nudo".

They are 1” (2.5 cm) long.

Choose between Brass or Gold-filled earwire.
Choose between Blue and Black leather.

The leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. Made to order, one at a time. They come in a cute box and muslin bag perfect for gift getting or giving.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: Nudo Pendant - Brass and knotted leather
description:
Hammered brass and knotted leather create a perfect pair and are the base for my collection called Nudo. Nudo means knot in Spanish.

Brass sheets are hand-cut and hammered to create the texture and the domed shape. Leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. Made one at a time.

I'm in love with the texture and happy to add a little volume to my designs! 

This pendant is 1” (2.5 cm) wide, with a 18" long chain. If you need a different chain length just let me know during checkout.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. 

Available in black and blue leather.

name: Nudo circled necklace
description:
Necklace hand fabricated from brass and blue deertan leather.

Brass sheets are cut, drilled, cleaned and formed. The leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. It also goes through small brass beads that gives it all the character and charm. I use a single piece of leather to make this necklace.

Pendant is 0.5" wide (1.3 cm) and 6" (15 cm) long. The leather cord is 40" long, and it is adjustable - you can wear it as long or short as you want. 

You can also wear it on your wrist and wrap the cord around, looks fun!

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original and was made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

Available in blue and hand-dyed raspberry.

name: Nudo Medium Necklace
description:
Hammered brass and knotted leather create a perfect pair and are the base for my collection called Nudo. Nudo means knot in Spanish.

Brass sheets are hand-cut and hammered to create the gorgeous texture and the domed shape. Leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. The length is adjustable to your fancy. Made one at a time.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. 

Maximum length is 35" (89 cm). About 2" (5 cm) wide.

Also available in black.

name: Nudo Triple Necklace
description:
This is the statement piece of the Nudo collection.

Three pieces of brass are hand-cut and hammered to add a gorgeous texture and volume. Leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. The length is adjustable to your fancy. Made one at a time.

Maximum length is 35" (89 cm). Maximum width (top piece) is 3.5" (9 cm).

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. 

Available in Blue and Black leather.

name: Nudo Half-circle bracelet
description:
The geometric half-circle cut balances nicely with the texture of the hammered brass and the leather knots. I'm in love with the texture and happy to add a little volume to my designs. 

Brass sheets are cut and hammered to create the texture and the shape. Leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. 

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. 

It is 1.5" wide (3.9 cm) (at its widest point) and 6" (15 cm) long, adjustable. If you need a special length, please contact me.

Also available in black.

name: Nudo Earrings - Brass and knotted leather
description:
Brass sheets are hand-cut and hammered to create the gorgeous texture and the domed shape. Leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. Made to order, one at a time.

These earrings are 1” (2.5 cm) wide, 1.5” (3.9 cm) long.
The earwires are gold-filled and custom handmade by me.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. 

Oh, and you can have it in black if you want, it looks great, too!

name: Nudo Thin Bracelet
description:
Brass sheets are cut and hammered to create the beautiful texture and the shape. Leather is knotted into the metal, so it's perfectly attached to it. Made one at a time.

Choose between blue and black leather - be prepared to answer questions about your bracelet, specially if you choose the blue knots! People always think they are lapis stones. 

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe. 

It is 0.5" wide (1.3 cm) and 6" (15 cm) long, adjustable. If you need a special length, please contact me.

name: 1Bar Nudo Earrings
description:
Single bar earrings, made from fine metal and knotted leather.

Available in Sterling Silver and Goldfilled. Al metal is produced in the US.

These earrings are 1.75” (4.5 cm) long.

The wire is hand formed with strong but precise hammer strokes to flatten it and create a drop-like shape. Then I carefully drill the holes, clean up and knot the leather.

Choose between blue leather that looks like lapislazuli (people actually think it's lapis!) and a yummy hand dyed white and raspberry. Note that the actual color might vary since it's hand-dyed in an uneven way to have variations in color.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: 1Bar2 Nudo Earrings
description:
Long dangling bar earrings, made from sterling silver or gold-filled wire and knotted leather.

These earrings are 3” (7.5 cm) long. All the metal is produced in the US.

The wire is hand formed with strong but precise hammer strokes to flatten it and create a drop-like shape. Then I carefully drill the holes, clean up and knot the leather.

Choose between blue leather that looks like lapislazuli (people actually think it's lapis!) and a yummy hand dyed white and raspberry. Note that the actual color might vary since it's hand-dyed in an uneven way to have variations in color.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: 3Bar Nudo Necklace
description:
3 bar necklace, made from forged wire and knotted leather.

Available in Sterling Silver and Goldfilled wire.
The chain is 18" (45 cm) long, and the pendant falls 2” (5 cm) down.
All metal is 14K Gold-filled produced in the US.

The wire is hand formed with strong but precise hammer strokes to create the drop shape. Then I drill holes, clean up, knot the leather and shape into a beautiful fan.

Choose between blue leather that looks like lapislazuli (people actually think it's lapis!) and a yummy hand dyed white and raspberry. Note that the actual color might vary since it's hand-dyed in an un-even way to have variations in color.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: 3V Nudo Necklace - knotted leather
description:
V-shaped necklace, handmade from fine metal and knotted leather.

Choose between Sterling Silver and Gold-filled. 
All metal is produced in the US. 

The V piece is 2.5" wide and 1.25" tall. The total length is about 17" including the chain and the hammered piece.

The wire is hand formed with strong but precise hammer strokes to create the beautiful shape. The leather is knotted through holes drilled into the hammered metal. 

Choose between blue leather that looks like lapislazuli (people actually think it's lapis!) and a yummy hand dyed white and raspberry. Note that the actual color might vary since it's hand-dyed in an un-even way to have variations in color.

Leather is Deertan Lace which is actually not deer but just as buttery soft as the original. It is real leather though, made following all environmental and health regulations from the US and Europe.

name: 3Bar Nudo Earrings
description:
3 bar earrings, made from hand-forged wire and knotted leather.

The wire is hand formed with strong but precise hammer strokes to create the drop shape. Then I drill holes, clean up, knot the leather and shape into a beautiful fan.

Available in Sterling Silver and Goldfilled wire. Al metal is produced in the US.

Choose between blue leather that looks like lapislazuli (people actually think it's lapis!) and a yummy hand dyed white and raspberry. Note that the actual color might vary since it's hand-dyed in an uneven way to have variations in color.

These earrings are 2.5” (6.3 cm) long.

name: Spiky target - hoop weaving
description:
This white circle-woven hoop in cotton, purple leather and a hint of my signature multicolor thread, has some spiky knotted leather that makes it look a little dangerous, but it's just there to protect you!

I took the time to nicely finish all the details, front AND back.

The hoop is 5" wide (13 cm), but with the textile in it, ends up being about 5.5" - the fabric is thick.

name: Saffron urchin - hoop cotton and leather textile art
description:
My take on the hoop fever. Mine is white woven in a circle motion, and has mustard yellow leather threads knotted to it. It looks like a sea urchin maybe, definitely comes from under the sea.

I love it and plan to make a lot more, when I have time. (you can ask for special color!).

I used off white cotton thread, yellow leather and multicolor thread for the ring detail. I took the time to nicely finish all the details, front AND back.

The hoop is 5" wide (13 cm), but with the textile in it, ends up being about 5.5" - the fabric is thick.
